items.title: Exciting Mashup Feature Added in Backend ðŸŽ‰
items.summary: This update introduces a new mashup functionality that allows users to generate songs based on two reference tracks. Key changes include the addition of new API endpoints and detailed documentation for the Suno MashupLyrics Generation API. The modifications enhance the overall service capabilities and provide clearer guidance for developers.

items.title: Exciting new mashup feature added in Platform Service ðŸŽ‰
items.summary: This update introduces a new mashup feature to the Platform Service, enhancing audio processing capabilities. Key changes include the addition of a new handler for mashup lyrics and modifications to existing handlers and core files to support this functionality. The overall impact improves the service's ability to generate and manage mashup audio content.
